item.title: ロシアのウクライナ侵攻を取材するジャーナリストたちは、ウクライナ当局の規則を破ったという理由で、脅迫されたり、資格を取り消されたり、拒否されたりしている（Ben Smith/Semafor)
item.description:
Ben Smith / Semafor:
Journalists covering Russia's Ukraine invasion have had their credentials threatened, revoked, or denied over charges they broke rules by Ukrainian authorities  —  Journalists covering the Russian invasion of Ukraine are engaged in a running, low-grade conflict with the Ukrainian government …

item.title: メディア学者のイーサン・ザッカーマンが、Twitterが事実上のデジタル公共広場になった理由、注目の政治、連盟の力などについて語ったQ&A(Wired)
item.description:
Wired:
Q&A with media scholar Ethan Zuckerman about why Twitter became the de facto digital public square, the politics of attention, the power of federation, and more  —  We talk to media scholar Ethan Zuckerman about why Twitter became the de facto digital public square and what other platforms like Bluesky or Mastodon might offer.

item.title: 情報筋の話：ジェフ・ザッカーのCNNとクリス・リヒトに対する不満はより頻繁になり、ザッカーは現・元スタッフの苦情のスイッチボードとして機能している（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Sources: Jeff Zucker's gripes about CNN and Chris Licht have become more frequent and Zucker is serving as a grievance switchboard for current and former staff  —  It's been more than a year since he was forced from the top job at the network.  Since then, he has made no secret of his frustrations …

item.title: DGAとスタジオが新労働契約の暫定合意に達し、賃金、ストリーミング残留物、安全、創作権、多様性、AI保護をカバー（Jeremy Fuster/The Wrap）
item.description:
Jeremy Fuster / The Wrap:
The DGA and studios reach a tentative deal on a new labor contract, covering wages, streaming residuals, safety, creative rights, diversity, and AI protections  —  The new deal also covers wage increases, creative rights and AI protections  —  The Directors Guild of America and the Alliance …

item.title: NBCのMeet the Pressの司会者Chuck Toddが9年ぶりに退任し、NBCホワイトハウス特派員Kristen Welkerが後を継ぐと語った（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
NBC's Meet the Press moderator Chuck Todd says he is stepping down after nine years and would be succeeded by NBC White House Correspondent Kristen Welker  —  He will be succeeded by Kristen Welker, NBC's chief White House correspondent and the co-anchor of “Weekend Today.”

item.title: パンデミックの後、米国の映画館は、より大きなスクリーン、暖房付きの座席、より高価な軽食、その他のアップグレードに数百万ドルを費やし、映画ファンを呼び戻そうと考えている（Jane Margolies/New York Times）。
item.description:
Jane Margolies / New York Times:
After the pandemic, some US cinemas hope to lure back moviegoers by spending millions on larger screens, heated seats, pricier refreshments, and other upgrades  —  After scraping by during the pandemic, cinemas are hoping to lure back moviegoers by spending millions of dollars on upgrades.

item.title: 情報源はこちらPixarは5月23日、Disneyのリストラの一環として、Lightyearの幹部2名を含む〜1200人のスタッフのうち75人を削減、Pixarは2013年に最後に〜30人を削減（Dawn Chmielewski/Reuters）。
item.description:
Dawn Chmielewski / Reuters:
Sources: Pixar cut 75 out of ~1,200 staff, including two Lightyear executives, on May 23 as part of Disney's restructuring; Pixar last cut ~30 jobs in 2013  —  Walt Disney's (DIS.N) Pixar Animation Studios has eliminated 75 positions including those of two executives behind box office disappointment …

item.title: GOP 2024年の討論会開催に向けたテレビ局の売り込みの様子、情報源は？CNNは保守的なアウトレットと提携し、他のWBDチャンネルで討論会を放映することを申し出た（Axios)
item.description:
Axios:
A look at TV networks' pitches to host the GOP 2024 debates; sources: CNN offered to partner with a conservative outlet and air the debate on other WBD channels  —  And who hosts those debates can have a significant impact on which contenders chose to participate, and how they perform.

item.title: イギリス、フランス、ドイツ、イタリア、スペインがFIFAと放送局に女子W杯の放映合意を呼びかけ、FIFAは「残念なオファー」とコメント（スカイニュース）
item.description:
Sky News:
The UK, France, Germany, Italy, and Spain call on FIFA and broadcasters to reach a deal to air the Women's World Cup; FIFA said the offers were “disappointing”  —  The joint statement comes weeks after the head of FIFA threatened not to show this year's tournament in the UK …

item.title: 1994年にDavidとBarbara Mikkelsonが設立したインターネットの神話や噂の事実確認サイト「Snopes」の盛衰と再生を深掘りする（Chantel Tattoli/Fast Company）。
item.description:
Chantel Tattoli / Fast Company:
A deep dive into the rise, fall, and rebirth of Snopes, the fact-checking website for internet myths and rumors founded by David and Barbara Mikkelson in 1994  —  America's premier fact-checking site was failed by the two men who had charge of it, critics say.

item.title: ティモシー・バークの弁護士は、依頼人が「Fox Newsをハッキングした」ことを否定したが、バークがどこでビデオを見つけたかは語らず、代わりに憲法修正第1条の権利を擁護した（ワシントンポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Timothy Burke's lawyer denies that his client “hacked Fox News” but does not say where Burke found the videos, instead offering a First Amendment rights defense  —  Federal investigators are probing the videos as a possible hack of Fox News.  But a lawyer for a former Deadspin …

item.title: Vimeoは、Apple TV、Android TV、Fire TV、Rokuアプリのサポートを2023年6月27日に終了する予定で、キャスティングによってユーザーに「より良い継続的な体験」を提供すると述べている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Vimeo plans to end support for its Apple TV, Android TV, Fire TV, and Roku apps on June 27, 2023, saying casting will give users a “better ongoing experience”  —  Vimeo is ending support for its existing TV apps — with the video management and hosting provider telling customers they'll have a …

item.title: SECへの提出書類：ナスダックはBuzzFeedに対し、1株あたり最低1ドルを満たしていないとして上場廃止のリスクを警告し、BuzzFeedに2023年11月27日まで株価を上げるよう与えている（J. Clara Chan/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
J. Clara Chan / The Hollywood Reporter:
SEC filing: Nasdaq warns BuzzFeed that it risks delisting for not meeting the $1/share minimum, giving BuzzFeed until November 27, 2023 to raise its stock price  —  The media company, led by CEO Jonah Peretti, has until Nov. 27 to bring up its stock price, according to an SEC filing.

item.title: ArtifactがクリックベイトヘッドラインにGPT-4を使用する計画方法：リライトはリクエストしたユーザーにのみ行い、その後人間のレビュアーがリライトをデフォルトとして設定することができる（Mike Krieger/Artifact News）。
item.description:
Mike Krieger / Artifact News:
How Artifact plans to use GPT-4 on clickbait headlines: rewrites only for users who request one, and then a human reviewer may set the rewrite as the default  —  At Artifact, we harness the power of AI and combine it with creative product design to improve the news & content experience for our users.

item.title: WBDのJB Perretteによると、HBO Maxの顧客層の〜70％が発売後1週間でMaxに乗り換え、Maxで視聴したコンテンツの〜20％がDiscovery+のものだったという（Joe Flint/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
WBD's JB Perrette says ~70% of HBO Max's customer base switched to Max in the first week of its launch and ~20% of the content viewed on Max was from Discovery+  —  Warner Bros. Discovery said about 70% of its HBO Max customer base switched to its new Max streaming platform in the first week of its launch …
